SEARCH
Package source.Database.Dao

Interface EnquiryDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryDaoImpl
public interface EnquiryDao
The EnquiryDao interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage. Also provides a method to get an entire list of enquiries and delete them.
Since:
11/19/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      boolean createEnquiry(Enquiry Enquiry)
      Creates an enquiry in the subsequent database (perhaps for sign up feature~)
      Parameters:
      Enquiry - the Enquiry to add
      Returns:
      true if managed to create, false if not

    • readEnquiry

      Enquiry readEnquiry(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads an enquiry from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an enquiry object if managed to find in our database

    • readEnquiry

      Enquiry readEnquiry(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads an enquiry from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table MUST SATISFY ALL QUERIES. Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      queries - queries to check that gives us the first result that satisfies the requirements.
      Returns:
      an enquiry object if managed to find in our database

    • readEnquiries

      ArrayList<Enquiry> readEnquiries(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all Enquiries that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      query - a database query
      Returns:
      an arraylist of Enquiry if found, an empty list if not.

    • readEnquiries

      ArrayList<Enquiry> readEnquiries(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads all Enquiries that satisfies all the properties (Overloaded) NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      queries - an array of database queries
      Returns:
      an arraylist of Enquiry if found, an empty list if not.

    • updateEnquiry

      boolean updateEnquiry(Enquiry Enquiry)
      Updates an enquiry in the subsequent database. Directly updates the file straight away.
      Parameters:
      Enquiry - the Enquiry to update
      Returns:
      true if managed to update, false if not

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(DatabaseQuery query)
      Deletes an enquiry in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(Enquiry Enquiry)
      Deletes an enquiry in the subsequent database
      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

    • getEnquiries

      ArrayList<Enquiry> getEnquiries()
      Function to get the list of all Enquiry objects if needed
      Returns:
      the list of Enquiry stored in the database

    • refresh

      void refresh()
      Function to refresh the database by saving this context and then reading it again.
